title: Connecting Scathach to Tituba American Horror Story Theory Video
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: This has nothing to do with the theory, but in Coven when Madison starts to gloat about how she demonstrated Transmutation without thinking about it, Cordelia then says that a witch's power spikes in times of crisis. Wouldn't you think that the Apocalypse would be the biggest crisis of them all. That would make all witches extremely powerful, and think about how powerful Cordelia would be because she's the supreme.
"In each generation there is one woman who employs countless gifts, some say , all of them. She is the Supreme" -Cordelia Fox S1E1:Coven
If there are multiple Supremes, does that mean there are multiple councils? One for each school? When the council came to confront Fiona it seemed like she was THE Supreme and not one of many

Awesome theory video! 

I also have a theory: If Scathach somehow lost her powers, the Salem witches would lose their powers as well since they are her descendants and inherited her “god-given” magic. Also, Queenie has both voodoo and witchcraft ancestry, which is why she is able to practice both
just a correction: the first picture is not a sketch of Tituba, it's a sketch of Filipino hero Melchora Aquino 💞
